text: Garry Winogrand (January 14, 1928 â€“ March 19, 1984) was an American street photographer, known for his portrayal of U.S. life and its social issues, in the mid-20th century. == References == Category:1928 births Category:1984 deaths Category:American photographers Category:Artists from New York City Category:People from the Bronx
